name: RawAutocomplete
desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.RawAutocomplete} A widget for helping the user make a selection by entering some text and choosing from among a list of options.

fields.name: fieldViewBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.fieldViewBuilder} Builds the field whose input is used to get the options.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: The [FocusNode] that is used for the text field.

fields.name: optionsViewBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.optionsViewBuilder} Builds the selectable options widgets from a list of options objects.

fields.name: optionsViewOpenDirection
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.optionsViewOpenDirection} The direction in which to open the options-view overlay.

fields.name: displayStringForOption
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.displayStringForOption} Returns the string to display in the field when the option is selected.

fields.name: onSelected
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.onSelected} Called when an option is selected by the user. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: optionsBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.optionsBuilder} A function that returns the current selectable options objects given the current TextEditingValue. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: textEditingController
fields.desc: The [TextEditingController] that is used for the text field.

fields.name: initialValue
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.initialValue} The initial value to use for the text field. {@endtemplate}
